reviewText:
LISTEN THIS IS BETTER THAN PETS IN PARADISE Vol 1.  HAVING JULIET IN THIS VIDEO IS WHAT THIS SERIES NEEDED SHE IS THE HOTTEST PET EVER IF NOT THE HOTTEST GIRL ON THE PLANET. SUCH A GODDESS!!!  AND WITH THE SOFTCORE LESBIAN TOUCHS BETWEEN DEVON SUZETTE TERA AND JULIET YOU DO NOT NEED HARDCORE PORNOGRAPHY. THESE ARE FANTASIES AND THEY DON'T QUITE GO ALL THE WAY LEAVING THE VIEWER TO IMAGINE THE REST.  ANYWAY GET THIS VID FOR JULIET.
YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.
The Best Penthouse DVD video and one of the most beautiful looking Penthouse women in video,the directing is great.

This one is a must have, especially if you like Juliet Cariaga.  She is in two solo scenes and one with the three other girls.  The other girls include Tera Patrick, Devon, and another cute perky blond.  This is explicit with good full frontal and rear shots.  Three of the girls appear to be natural with Devon being the one with augmentation.  Fun photo shoot with great photography and good close up shots.

Excellent girls and locations and some nice ideas but could have been improved with tighter editing and directing. Some scenes hang fire and lose impetus while others chop and change from shot to shot too frequently. Juliet and Suzette are hot though as is Devon but she sadly lacks a solo of her own as does Tera though I always find her overrated. Well worth having as a supplement to the classic Vol 1.

Pets in Paradise 2 is one of the best new releases, with beautiful models in a tropical environment (pool, waterfalls). The heat is everywhere: nice solos and girl/girl scenes. I gave it only three stars because I was expecting a similar or a better result than Pets in Paradise 1, but unfortunately this sequel didn't exceeded it. Anyway, compared with the other lame new releases, Pets in Paradise 2 is a must see.
This DVD is hotter than pets in paradise. The scenes are sexier. Tera,Suzette,Juliet and Devon are very beautiful and show all. The best scenes are the solo scenes with Suzette and Juliet.

Pets in Paradise 2 is disappointing and falls very short of PiP 1. It's the same concept as volume 1, but there are four women this time: Juliet Cariaga, Suzette Spencer, Devon, and Tera Patrick (who was also in volume 1). We get to see scenes consisting of either one of the women solo or multiple women.

There are five scenes. Three solo scenes for Juliet, Suzette, and Tera. One scene features all four women, and one scene features Devon and Suzette. The best scene is Devon and Suzette's lesbian romp. This is the real deal with the actual contact being hidden through the use of camera angles... most of the time. The four way also had some good stuff, except it was never really a four way. Somebody should have explained to Juliet that this was a Penthouse video and not a calendar shoot. While Devon, Suzette, and Tera were all over each other, Juliet just kind of posed in the background, probably thinking, "Like, oh my gawd! Don't they know there are cameras filming them?". This attitude was also apparent in Juliet's solo scene where she did a very good impersonation of a rock. Basically, they should have left that pet back home.

This DVD also suffers from two other problems. First, the solo scenes drag. Pip 1 had more solo scenes and they were shorter, so they didn't ever get tedious. Second, the video quality is poor in places. Lot's of stuff has been filmed slow motion, which results in a lot of jaggies in the video.

I don't recommend this one.

I'm appalled with this DVD,Pets In Paradise 1 is a masterpiece,but this DVD is horrid. First off why on earth did Penthouse get nasty Devon(a pornstar with so many tatoos I lost count)and why would they not edit out her spitting and lose the [adult] toys even though they not used their are still annoying. Secondly why let Juliet only have 2 tame and short scenes when she is the only positive  thing going for this DVD. Also Suzette looks very cheap and low class in this film when I have seen her in real life and she is very pretty. I could only give this 2 stars because so much potential wasted but worth looking at for the 2 scenes of Juliet,I would recomend PET OF THE YEAR 2000 WINNER IF YOUR A FAN OF JULIET LIKE ME INSTEAD OF THIS DVD.

This DVD needs to ditch Devon(nasty pornstar)and Tera Patrick(another pornstar)and get better models. Juliet Cariaga is the only reason I bought this and she only is given 2 scenes which are rather tame. Pet Of The Year 2000 Winner blows this DVD out of the water,so if you are impessed with Juliet's beauty pickup POTY 2000 Winner she has 4 scenes and shows off her body a lot more. Also whats going on with Devon splitting,is that some kind bad pornstar habit? NOT VERY GOOD FLICK UNLESS YOU HAVE TO SEE THE 2 SCENES WITH JULIET (P.S. JULIET LOOKS GOOD ON THE COVER BUT SEXIER ON POTY 2000 WINNER COVER)

Well, I met her in person at the Glamourcon here in Los Angeles. She was not only gorgeous but very nice as well. I researched which Penthouse vids she was in and got 'em. This title though is by far her best. Very sensual and sexy yet open and explicit at times so you do get the best of both worlds. Her shots pack a lot of heat! Well done in this fan's eyes. If you are into great looking brunettes or in Juliet's case...just a damn fine woman, get this! Cheers!
